title: FS: Postcards - PCL San Francisco Recreation Park/Hershey Field/Babe Ruth
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: Postcards - PCL San Francisco Recreation Park (awesome content); Babe Ruth
posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping and are net to me.

Two hard to find Recreation Park San Francisco stadium postcards. The one with writing has a neat note making fun of how poorly he addressed it and talking about attending games - he even put a green X on his seat on the front. The unused example has an erasure along the top of the back.

Unused: SOLD

Used: [STRIKE]$85[/STRIKE] $70

Rebacked Babe Ruth postcard - the back is a real RPPC but the front is modern. Novelty piece. $15 (SOLD)

Hershey PA postcard that is shaped like a candy bar: $15 (SOLD)
Not sure I have ever bumped a BST thread that was last bumped 6 years ago, but here it is!
